title: I cant sign up for the Pbe because of error 500
body: I keep trying to sign up for the league of legends pbe but whenever I click on the link to sign up I just go to  page that says error 500 and a picture of blitzcrank, idk what I am doing wrong.

replies.body:
Don't worry, its not a problem on your end. A lot of people were having issues, and the signup server for PBE is down, see this status page for some updates:

http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe

There is also a relevant sticky below:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Q8vGhigp-442017-pbe-signup-site-issues

All I can say is, keep an eye on the server status, and hopefully they'll resolve the issue soon. Right now there is no ETA on a fix.

Thanks for the assist, Malcom Sylvanas!  Indeed, the PBE page has been having issues so we had to take it down for maintenance.  As of last night, the site will be down until further notice until some overhaul is done.  There's a[ post on the PBE boards](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed) now for updates.  Hang tight!
